text: int main ( ) { int t , n , i , j , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] = { 0 } , k ; long int max , sum ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } max = 0 ; sum = 0 ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= n ; j ++ ) { k = j ; sum = a [ n ] [ j ] ; for ( i = n - 1 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { if ( k == 1 ) { for ( k = i ; k >= 1 ; k -- ) sum += a [ k ] [ 1 ] ; break ; } if ( k == i ) { sum += a [ i ] [ k - 1 ] ; k = k - 1 ; continue ; } else { if ( a [ i ] [ k ] > a [ i ] [ k - 1 ] ) sum += a [ i ] [ k ] ; else { sum += a [ i ] [ k - 1 ] ; k = k - 1 ; } } } if ( max < sum ) max = sum ; } printf ( "%ld\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
